name: Krampus' Present
description:
Game made for Broke After Xmas Game Jam.

You are Krampus' magical coal instructed to wreak havoc to this unsuspecting household. Be aware that moving around the house exhausts your fuel and the only source of energy you have are Santa's presents. Your objective is clear, and your fuel is limited. Good Luck!

WASD to move

Feedback is always appreciated (would also love to know your High Score)

Credits:

  • used assets available on opengameart.org:
    • Tree Sprite by b_o
    • Room interiors mostly stuff by Lanea Zimmerman (AKA Sharm)
    • NES 8-bit Sound Effects by Shiru 
    • Sound Effect Mini Pack by SwissArcadeGameEntertainment 
  • Player sprite, walls,  floors and ui assets were all made by me
